thread.section_title: PolicyGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PolicyGenius | policygenius.com
thread.title: Taylor McClellan

author: Taylor McClellan
title: Taylor McClellan
text: I don't normally write reviews, but this company deserves it. This is our second time using policy genius. Not only does it make the complexities of buying life insurance simple (they do most of the work for you), but it also has allowed us to shop for the most competative prices. They walk you through the process step by step and are incredibly friendly. I would recommend this company to everyone.
